onboarding.welcomeSubtitle: Your intelligent assistant that remembers what matters and helps you stay organized.
onboarding.nameDescription: We'll use this name to personalize your experience and make conversations feel more natural.
onboarding.nameMinChars: Name must be at least 2 characters
onboarding.notesDescription: Zen AI automatically takes notes while you talk to it. These notes act as a memory system - when you mention something related to a note, Zen AI retrieves that information instead of searching through your entire conversation history.
onboarding.aiTakesNotesDescription: As you chat, Zen AI remembers important information like your email, preferences, or details you share and stores them as notes
onboarding.retrieveInfoDescription: When you ask about stored information, Zen AI retrieves relevant notes immediately, saving time and providing more accurate responses
onboarding.manageNotesDescription: You can view, edit, or delete notes at any time through the Notes section in your dashboard
onboarding.notesExample: Try saying 'Remember that I have a meeting tomorrow at 3pm' or 'What did I tell you about my project?'
onboarding.gmailDescription: Connect your Gmail to enable AI-powered email analysis, priority scoring, and spam detection.
onboarding.calendarDescription: Sync your Google Calendar to view events and get help scheduling meetings with AI assistance.
onboarding.allSetDescription: Your account is configured and ready to use. Start exploring the full power of Zen AI.
